description: Fit the spectrum of the transient XRT 200515
instructions:
Given the spectral files for XRT 200515 and the model specifications in the paper, compute the best-fit parameters for two different models. 1. Compute N_H [units of 10^22 1/cm^2] and Gamma for the powerlaw model. 2. Compute N_H [units of 10^22 1/cm^2] and kT [keV] for the thermal model. 
 Return the results in a tuple (N_H_powerlaw, gamma_powerlaw, N_H_thermal,  kT_thermal).
